attributes.additional_details:
EXCUSE ME PLEASE - would you PLEASE Sign our Petition??? It is URGENT! We are trying to Stop them from building 275 houses directly next to our place & for Several Valid reasons we want this Stopped. Gotta hand in the Petition soon & hardly got any Signatures. If you live on the edge of the Proposed site it WILL affect you in some way or if you live in the town another part of the Outskirts will be lost forever www.ashbywest.co.uk
Please Please HELP us before it is too late!!!
